characterDescription:
Brightlord Revilar might have been handsome, if his nose hadn't been removed in a youthful duel.
His lands border those of Lin Davar. They are two of the ten men of similar rank who serve under their highprince.

characterDetails.Appearance: He wears a wooden replacement for his nose, painted black - a strange mixture of covering up the blemish and drawing attention to it at the same time. Silver-haired, well-dressed in a suit of a modern design, he still has the distracted look of someone who had left his hearth burning untended back at home.
characterDetails.Characteristics: He has two master-servants at his side. Their black-and-white uniforms were a distinction that ordinary servants were denied.
